existing_features.title: Replace the first of the 4 footer images in the document preview and PDF rendering with the uploaded image '20260228_092922_0002.png' (showing 'Yours faithfully, Dhani Finance LTD.' with signature and 'P Harish Reddy, Chief Executive Officer').
